website_summaries.verdict: A travel system designed for walkers, joggers, and runners with many convenient features.
pros: Can handle different types of terrain
Incredibly easy to unfold and store
cons: One of the more expensive models on our list, but parents say it's worth every penny

customer_reviews.title: Rusted Piece of Junk - Get the Thule instead
customer_reviews.text: After less than 1 year of use the rivets and grommets are all rusted. Just spoke with BOB Customer Service on the phone and they advised "oxidation is not covered under the warranty" and there was nothing they could do. This has been stored inside. It's been rained on a few times, but has not been used to an extreme extent. For a $400 stroller I would have expected stainless steel rivets and grommets to be used and to come with some level customer service. Recommending to all of our friends that they go with the competitive Thule model instead.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: It RUSTs... be aware ..
customer_reviews.text: Like others mention it RUSTs!! I had it only for three month, and there is rust already in many places... i really wanted to love it, but what a piece of junk... can we use alluminum for such things??? I still have britax b-ready from my first kid since 2012, living in the same climate, and not a single rust...
customer_reviews.author: VYK

customer_reviews.title: The front wheel suddenly falls off!!!  DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Britax has refused to do a recall on their jogging strollers. The front wheel falls off with no warning and you and your child go flying into the pavement.
customer_reviews.author: prudy

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel can fall off, causing injuries
customer_reviews.text: After hundreds of crashes and injuries, company refused to recall. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nermin Suljic

customer_reviews.title: Great until the tire goes
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. I tested it again the Thule and that had too much bounce for me as this is primarily used for running. I took it out 3 times, on cement and the tire is now flat. There is no puncture but it won't stay inflated. I tried to contact customer service as this seems like more of a faulty tire since this was lightly used on flat streets but they said they won't help. Game me an example of if you get a flat after buying a new car it's not covered. Well I hope it would be if it were a faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: sunchik

customer_reviews.title: Faulty wheel on new product; wheel feels cheap, strong rubber chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the tire was faulty on the stroller I received. Very disappointed. The rep. would only send me the rubber part of the wheel and I would need to take a trip to the bike shop to look at it for me. Personally I think that is too much trouble to go thru for a new product I just received today. Poor customer service
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE OUR BOB STROLLER
customer_reviews.text: WE LOVE OUR BOB STROLLER! I've owned this stroller for few months now and I LOVE it. PRO: - sturdy, good build quality - reclinable seat - big tires (it's actual rubber tire with air blown in. it also makes it very smooth to ride, just like bicycles) - able to go running with the baby in it CON: - too heavy - big/bulky (takes up too much space in my trunk but that's the trade off for having a sturdy,stable stroller) - small basket size - adding accessories can be costly
customer_reviews.author: Skarwind

customer_reviews.title: best I've found but
customer_reviews.text: This is the best I found. My husband likes to run on light trails and in the city which sometimes has large curbs and bumps. The stroller takes them pretty well but sometimes the front wheel jolts to the side (from straight forward to sideways) causing the stroller to bounce and skip aggressively. It almost looks like its going to tip over from time to time. It also now does the wheel thing when were not running too so I might have to look into this issue more. I also find it hard to fold and lock up. My husband has an easier time than me but I struggle with it. Still the best for jogging.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Tags

customer_reviews.title: purchased about 2 weeks ago AMAZING LOVE LOVE LOVE this stroller
customer_reviews.text: purchased about 2 weeks ago AMAZING LOVE LOVE LOVE this stroller. I wish I would have saved my money and not bought the spiffy fancy NUNA. I would have saved time and money from trying to resell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bob is the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic jogging stroller with all of the upgraded features that the older Bob models needed. This specific color has the gorgeous all black frame which is so pretty and usually only comes in the Pro versions with the handlebar brakes. I also love knowing this stroller is so reflective when we go on walks at night with our daughter. This was a definite upgrade from our 2015 Bob flex and I recommend bob strollers to everyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor - The Baby Gear LadyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t live up to the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I would expect more, a lot more. It’s super hard to open, it doesn’t fold open.. you need to open it slowing by pulling on other parts of the stroller. I’ve hurt myself so many times trying to open it. Closing it is just as bad. You pinch the handles and it folds down, then you grab the red handle and kind of jerk it into more of a folded standing position but ours stopped working after 3 or 4 times. The red handle barely works. Our time frame for a refund expired so we are stuck with a mediocre pricy stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for running and all around use
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is fantastic - I'm currently training for a marathon and this has held up so well with many miles pushing my 3 year old, on all different kind of terrain. It folds up easily, stores in a small space, and practically steers itself. After looking at strollers and reviews for hours and settling on this one, I am incredibly happy with our purchase! Would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller !
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this just for Disney World/Orlando theme parks, etc. I researched many of the jogging strollers and have no regrets with the BOB. My daughter is 5 years old, 44 inches and weighs 45 pounds. She fits fine in the stroller, not too big and not too small. The BOB pushes so much easier than the Graco $99 from Target I had before this. No comparison at all. The only negative to me is lack of included drink/snack tray and also no handlebar console. For such an expensive stroller these should be included. I bought the handlebar console and it is fine for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Vates'

customer_reviews.title: easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Color is sleek, easy to maneuver. I originally gave it four stars because I had the old Revolution body style with my first child and this one seemed so much bigger. I use it for jogging and also as an every day stroller and it seemed too big compared to my old one, but after taking it out the first time I'll give it five stars! Can't imagine going back to my smaller one now. The adjustable handlebar seemed like a silly thing but it's my favorite feature now :)
customer_reviews.author: Jjones1008

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller, but bring a air pump!
customer_reviews.text: In general, I love this stroller. I would have given it a fifth star if I didn't have to inflate the tires so regularly. I bought a portable bike pump ($17) for it and the pump always stays with the stroller because the tires are so often low or flat. This has been a problem for me since the very first use, but they are easy to fill. It breaks down easily, and takes up the entire trunk space of my Toyota Matrix. It maneuvers nicely and smoothly. The BOB handlebar console is a worthwhile accessory purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MK Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Item came with stain!!!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Amazon did make the frustrating situation better. They resolved my issue quickly and promptly. Happy with this stroller and Amazon! Relatively simple to assemble- especially if you reference YouTube videos. HATE that this stroller came with a stain (see attached photo) disappointing for a $300 stroller. I might as well have bought a used one for $200 cheaper if I wanted it to look used. Very disappointed. Also does not fold down very small with wheels on (not a problem for me, but worth noting.)
customer_reviews.author: elena makiyama

customer_reviews.title: Love the stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. We purchased the adapter and have been using it since we returned from the hospital. I love that we have been able to use it on trails, gravel, etc. only downside is that any additional items you need for the stroller you have to purchase separately and it’s expensive!- car seat adapter, stroller tray, cup holder, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: They don't help when defective product purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this stroller on maybe 4 short walks in the city, on the sidewalk, and both tires go completely pancake flat in 8-10 minutes. I'd understand if one tire went flat, maybe something punctured it, but this is absolutely a defect. I contacted the manufacturer and my response was "tires aren't covered under the warranty, sorry about your luck!" Absolutely ridiculous, even after explaining to the rep that this has to be a defect.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: BEAST
customer_reviews.text: I love this jogger! It is really the ultimate ATV of strollers. It's comfortable to run with, maneuvers easily (especially when pushing with just one hand), and even going over curbs or transitioning to grass does not wake up my sleeping baby! I swear this stroller has a suspension system just for that purpose! The seat has enough adjustments on it that my baby was able to ride comfortably in it as a newborn and it will certainly be an essential piece of equipment as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: annasnafu

customer_reviews.title: Bite the bullet and get The Bob!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had listened to my mom and bought this stroller originally. Instead I purchased the Burley Solstice first and that was a huge mess from the initial box opening. We love Bob! We live in the country and it’s dirt roads any direction and this stroller is amazing for my 10 month old. The ride is so smooth for him that it puts him to sleep easily. Don’t waste your time and frustration on other strollers. I thought it was more money than wanted to spend but so glad I finally did because it is worth every penny!! Baby squeals with joy when I head the stroller towards the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Jane

customer_reviews.title: Best Stroller Ever!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5 which is typically too old for a stroller but he has some orthopedic issues. I hesitated to buy him a "medical stroller" or even a wheel chair and took a chance on this one. It is a little spendy but it is the very best stroller I could have ever imagined! It is just perfect for him and I pray that he only has to use it for a few more years ;) IF I ever had another child, I would buy this stroller again. It is worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Kato

customer_reviews.title: I love the ease of pushing the stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of pushing the stroller, the look and feel of it. I was disappointed that the canopy doesn’t stay down all the way, was hoping with the other reviews that the kunar would maybe have been better, thus why i rated it 4 stars. Otherwise, it cane on time and so far like it better than my previous jogging stroller. Adjustable handlebar is also a nice add on. Definitely not big enough for my 4 year old to sit in (he is tall for his age though).
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Mostly great, some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy this is to push! Awesome control even with only 1 hand - so easy to change directions with the wheel unlocked. With the wheel locked, it only goes straight - can’t turn corners or navigate a windy path unless you tip back on te back wheels and readjust the direction. Wish it was lighter and easier to fold / unfold, and I couldn’t get it to fold completely to clip it with the Chico car seat adapter. It’s pretty heavy to get in and out of the car, but doable. It’s really awesome on paved and unpacked surfaces! Drives like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Penguin4ducky

customer_reviews.title: It’s a cadillac
customer_reviews.text: This is a Cadillac of strollers!!! Excellent suspension. Love that you can adjust handle height. Really adds to comfort of the person pushes the stroller. My toddler loves that she sits high. Feels almost like sitting on a high bench with comfy back rest and nice step to rest their feet on. Way better than the last stroller I had and liked. Would recommend it to EVERYBODY
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Tires Flat
customer_reviews.text: All three tires go flat. Seems to be a common problem. For $450 the tires should NEVER go flat. They go flat in a couple days or so. Apparently I need to install new tubes. Great, b/c that's what I feel like spending my afternoon on. Replacing tubes on a brand new stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Owen

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love the BOB... the ride is smooth for my month old baby. She’s able to nap during works (will update once I start jogging) It is heavy/bulky would never use for an every day errand stroller. I’m 5’3 but the handle bar adjusts low enough for me to use without difficulty. For price I would have like a handbrake.
customer_reviews.author: Andres n' Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for Running
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this stroller! I love the reflective design. It’s so easy to use and is great for a runner like myself. We frequently run with the stroller and it’s so smooth and light. I highly recommend this stroller to all kinds of people especially runners!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for strolling through the mall or taking a walk/run on the gravel trail in my neighborhood. I purchased the adapter for the Britax car seat and it works perfectly. Baby is secure in the seat and mama is happy and staying active!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is amazing!!! I absolutely love it! Maneuvers great and smooth or rough terrain. I’m an avid runner so a really good jogging stroller is important to me. I love how my baby sits high up in the seat because he loves to look around at everything. The stroller is not heavy at all and easy to fold. So glad I found this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aniedra L. Durnell

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Stroller Jogger - Very Happy with this purchase, worth every $
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best purchase and baby gift ever! Researched alot and decided to get whole package of BOB stroller, car seat converter, and drink holder with tire pump! Bought as gift for new granddaughter and she loves it, as well as her mommy and doggie! Helps the whole family to get exercise while baby is still young bc her carseat is now converted in BOB jogger stroller. Helps new mommy to get out of house and de-stress while enjoying baby, doggie, exercise, and fresh air! Very easy to assemble and BOB customer service was extremely accommodating and helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jogger
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jogger , worth the price . I saw this jogger at the mall and I was in love with it and I knew this is the one I want for my baby . We have been using this from last 8 months and we love it , looks awesome light weight , lot of space underneath ,and works great when we go in trails for long walk . Only bad part is we have to buy accessories separately :( . And I am looking forward to use this for few years and definitely recommend to friends and family who are expecting . GET THE BOB :)
customer_reviews.author: Amit Dhawan

customer_reviews.title: High price but darn nice stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Got this bad boy on Black Friday, honestly that was the only way to swallow the cost of this thing. It is the greatest stroller ever made. Works very very well. Works on grass. Works jogging. Is a pain to put in and out of the trunk tho. So if you do buy this buy $19 dollar stroller for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love my BOB! At first, the canopy kept caving in. But I let it settle fully extended for a few days and I’ve had no problems since. As long as I don’t put weight on it, it stays extended. This is a nice color and very reflective. My daughter who hates the stroller really likes this one. Comfy seat and pockets that are a easy grab for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Bb

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller so worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, every time we have the stroller out doing......anything my husband and I are so glad we purchased this stroller. We use it on our land to walk around. Walks around the neighborhood. Outdoor......anything! Its perfect. And our son loves it, he is always super comfortable and I never have to worry about bumpy rides because of the shock! AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase. Perfect for walks right now and looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. Perfect for walks right now and looking forward to running again when my daughter is older. Smooth ride for her and smooth push for me. Front wheel turns on a dime. A little heavy but once I figured out how to quickly close it, I’m used to the size now. Looking forward to using this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieDog

customer_reviews.title: I love how the stroller glides and it has a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how the stroller glides and it has a great turning radius. As expensive as it is, the sun shade has been a huge disappointment for us. It does not stay down and is constantly folding in on itself. Not sure if we have a defective stroller or this is just how it is. I would have expected more based on the price of this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all. Got the orange one. Very cool ride for the little dude. Easy to assemble. You should buy an air pump for stroller tires but once filled no problem.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Kennerly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stroller
customer_reviews.text: So easy to move! Turns smoothe. Big wheels are good for any terrain. Adjustable seat great for awake or sleeping baby. Compartment below seat is great for a small bag. Adjustable push handle perfect for any height person.
customer_reviews.author: JHines

customer_reviews.title: Not a runner or jogger. LOVE MY BOB!
customer_reviews.text: Love the BOB! Baby #3 is only 3 weeks so have only used it with the infant car seat and adapter. I had a BOB 10 years ago with my first child and wouldn't want anything else. Love the updated adjustable handlebar and improved brake. Perfect for going to the beach, walks in the woods, and everywhere in between. Such a smooth ride. Wouldn't want anything else!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller for Walking and Jogging
customer_reviews.text: I tried to get away with buying a cheaper Graco running stroller but it pulled to one side and the ride wasn’t as smooth as I’d hoped. As soon as we tried this the first time I knew it was worth the money. The ride is so smooth and it’s so easy to push. I’d highly recommend this if you’re active.
customer_reviews.author: Jen from MI

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller so much!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tires! Very smooth ride and adjustable shocks. I'm a short girl so the fully adjustable handlebars were a must-have feature. Very quick and easy to make tight turns. We were given a Britax B-Safe car seat and are just awaiting the stroller adapter to come in. Folding it down is a cinch, too -- fits great in my Honda Fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: I had a used one in Japan and I loved it. Got back to the states and ordered a brand new one I love it. Not just for running bc I’m NOT a runner lol
customer_reviews.author: Kgreg

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller ever
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller ever!!! Easy to fold and open. You can easily steer it with one hand and smoothly! Handle bar is high and adjustable it has shocks on the wheels so your kids don’t get jiggled around when you go over bumps. It’s really great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tall people.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6'7" and I am 6'1" and this is the absolute perfect stroller for our height. This is our third Bob, we had a single, duallie and upgraded to this because of the adjustable handle. We paired it with the Chicco Fit 2 carseat and adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Our BOB stroller is wonderful! It is large
customer_reviews.text: Our BOB stroller is wonderful! It is large, but we use it for all off-road terrain and all theme parks. It rolls well on any surface and has held up to all weather elements. Only complaint is that you have to buy each accessory separately (which becomes costly).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thing is great. Whats more to say?
customer_reviews.text: This stroller rocks. We love it. It has tons of space to store stuff also. LOADS of attachments, fantastic product. 5/5, would buy again if we really needed to.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heavy-duty stroller. But if you are a petite person, it’s cumbersome to close and lift especially in and out of a vehicle. It’s not meant for carrying along in smaller vehicles. It takes up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: HettieF

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced and easily managed by grandpa!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. This is our second BOB for grandchildren. The first is on our farm. Its great on rough roads, back yard fields and fits easily into the back of the car. This new one is in LA where it's equally versatile on the streets and sidewalks. The newer one has a better - arranged back support system. The add-on Handle Bar Console is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Arthur Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and smooth! I sold my bumbleride indie to buy a BOB because of the triangle in the front feature. And I’m so glad I did! With my third child almost here, I can wear the baby, my 2 year old buckled in to the stroller seat, and my 4 year old can take breaks and ride on the triangle front seat feature. Bam all 3 kids with a single seater tough stroller!! Thanks BOB!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, rides smooth, great large size, daughter appears comfortable. Great buy and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ktb

customer_reviews.title: Best jogger out there
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this jogger is the bee’s knees. Great support, handling, and smooth ride for my son. He absolutely loves riding in this bad boy. I hope it lasts forever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shade. Very smooth ride.
customer_reviews.text: The BOB was WELL worth the investment. It handles so smoothly. You can steer it with one hand while doing something with the other. My baby takes his last nap of the day in it and doesn’t wake up if I go over curbs or rocks. The shade comes down so far. The sun never gets in babies eyes which is something I always fought in my other stroller. Nice storage underneath. Baby seems very comfortable. Will have for years to come!!
customer_reviews.author: Mac McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Great on all terrains
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! It is so easy to push and has amazing safety features. It adjusts to my baby as he grows and is comfortable for him even on rough terrain.
customer_reviews.author: patti tellez

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine going for a walk now without my Bob. It travels so easily over uneven sidewalks and off-road terrain. My favorite feature, though, is th the adjustable handle. This allows my husband and I to set the handle at a comfortable height for both of us and avoid wrist strain. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: ... the most expensive items but this stroller is the best. It is so easy and smooth on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am never into fads or the most expensive items but this stroller is the best. It is so easy and smooth on the roads and rock surfaces (we live in colorado, great for trails and hikes). My baby is 9 months, we've been using it for about 2 months now. She's on the littler side but she handles sitting in the stroller well. A few more months and she'll be a perfect fit. I am a big supporter of the BOB strollers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: I got this stroller while it was on sale and I love it! Not sure if I’d get it now that it’s almost double the price. Not sure I love it that much lol. But it is definitely worth the $250 I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Thorley

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller but the shade cover is faulty.
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller but the top of ours is defective and won't stay down when extended, the canvas seems too tight and snaps the shade cover back when you try to extend it. Otherwise it's a great stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Car seat Strap and leverage gets stuck—otherwise, love
customer_reviews.text: I love the bob—it’s so easy. The issues I’ve had with it (only had it for six months) is the red car seat strap fell off. Also, the red leverage to collapse it is now a pain and gets stuck everytime. If you’re looking to use it weekly, I’m not sure I would recommend it then especially if you have to collapse it each time like I do. I use it often and it’s starting to wear just after six months.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't go back to any other stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this stroller! My 4 month old is comfortable, she just sits back and relaxes. It's easy to push and does really well on any terrain. it's only downfall is it's bulkiness. But I love it so much it doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy DiBernardo

customer_reviews.title: canopy flaw and Bob/Britax customer service makes it hard to fix
customer_reviews.text: As many pointed out, the front canopy does not stay fully extended after a few steps. I called the Bob/Britax customer service, I believe my case is not the only issue; they did not even bother to hear what is happening, they simply ask me to send a video of what is happening. As a new parent, taking a baby out is already very stressful; taking a video is making it more unpleasant. If you can, avoid this model.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The best stroller I ever got my hands on
customer_reviews.text: The best stroller I ever got my hands on! All the positive reviews are correct - this stroller is gliding, almost pushing itself! Such a smooth ride for my baby! I am still using car seat (with the adapter purchased separately) because my baby is still small (4.5 months). The smoothness of the ride is unbelievable. Maneuverability is amazing. Truly an all terrain stroller. Should have bought it right away when he was born!
customer_reviews.author: Martina Z.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Front canopy does not stay down. Uncomfortable back support. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mark luley

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves his new ride
customer_reviews.text: I just can't say enough how much I love this stroller. My previous one wasn't cutting it in the trails. My baby is now cushioned from all the bumps in the trails and can enjoy his ride and a snooze when he wants to.
customer_reviews.author: New mom 2016

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Bob. Our first was a double and we loved it for our twins. It was amazing. This one we have had a lot of problems with. Main issue is folding it up. When you pull the cord it doesn't release.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller. Very smooth and has a high weight limit. However if you have a tall toddler like I do their head will be resting on the top of the stroller right under the hood. Other than that it’s gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Beard

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I got this jogger shortly after having baby. I was able to use it quickly because it lays down pretty flat. Also pretty easy to fold up and unfold. I love my BOB!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller
customer_reviews.text: BOB STROLLERS ARE THE BEST STROLLERS OUT THERE!! Don’t hesitate to buy. Can push with my pinky finger, easy to maneuver, strolls on sand!
customer_reviews.author: Carla M.

customer_reviews.title: This word best represents the stroller
customer_reviews.text: Butter! This word best represents the stroller!! It glides over grass dirt and other terrain so easily! My daughter is comfortable and happy while she's in it because she is able to sit straight up instead of laying down the whole time. The convenience and ease of being able to lay her down when she falls asleep is wonderful! The break is very easy to use also! So happy I went for the stroller, totally worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where were these in my parenting day?  Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for new grandbaby. It easily collapses and is a dream to maneuver. Light, comfortable, with all the right compartments for fun and ease on trail or street.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Work great, steers great, easy transport, love the movable handle fits both my 6f5in husband and my shorter self. Only downfalls are small undercarriage, and the top part flings back like it's needs stretched out, but that will hopefully go away with use.
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Pushes like a dream
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is amazing. Well worth the price. We bought this for our granddaughter and I have used it at my daughter’s house and can’t believe the difference it is between the ones I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Chandler

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't suggest getting an open box off amazon, ours came damaged, they did refund a little of the money. But I absolutely love my bob stroller! It's perfect on trails and pushes so much easier than my baby trend! With the snack tray and parent consul it's a perfect stroller
customer_reviews.author: Amber V.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Great for beach and walks! Use it for stroller strides work outs. Comfortable for baby. Must get the 2016 because it has adjustable recliner. Any version before 2016 doesn't have this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie: mom, party planner, wife

customer_reviews.title: Tires came flat
customer_reviews.text: I am super super disappointed. I was looking forward to finally using my BOB jogging stroller as my child was old enough and the tires are flat. When I pump them they fill with air and instantly lose them. I have not even used the stroller yet - it was sent with torn inner tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy instructions, not too much packaging. Excited to put our baby in here and hit the trails!
customer_reviews.author: Christin Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I love it for ease of use. I run with it with my baby in a the snug ride 35 and adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! This jogger is fantastic. It has made running so much easier for me. I was struggling with running and actually was going to quit if this jogger didn't help. The only issue I have now is the heat outside! If you are thinking about buying a BOB to help with your running, just do it!
customer_reviews.author: Emanon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is amazing, easy to put together, and great to walk with. My son falls asleep in it constantly and is very comfortable. So glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: So easy to push. Comfortable for daughter. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: james long

customer_reviews.title: I have only lightly used this Bob since buying it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only lightly used this Bob since buying it a few months ago, and only for walks not for jogging. I finally decided to fold it and put it in the basement for the winter when I discovered that it doesn't fold back. It turns out the straps are installed incorrectly and block the folding mechanism
customer_reviews.author: AAJN

customer_reviews.title: Worth the splurge
customer_reviews.text: Worth it! I love the ease of steering and taking it out and putting it away. Very smooth steering.
customer_reviews.author: JU

customer_reviews.title: So amazing compared to the Chico stroller i was using previously
customer_reviews.text: So amazing compared to the Chico stroller i was using previously. The stroller is incredibly easy to maneuver and push. Folding it is easy as well. The only reason it isn't a 5 star review is because the shade kept popping up and not staying down making it hard to always cover my daughters face. There are some idea online on how to fix this i might try.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay87

customer_reviews.title: Part of the family
customer_reviews.text: Served our family perfectly for the last two years. After hundreds of walks, trips and hikes it’s still amazing. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Sierra117

customer_reviews.title: Style & substance
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to use this stroller in the nicer weather. Beautiful construction, easy to assemble, smooth handling, and very cool looking in the lagoon.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn KSG

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Husband uses it all the time. Too big for travel though.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy well made stroller. Worth the price. Good for inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant in the beginning because of the price. My wife runs marathons and I dabble on the shorter runs. After using this product it’s worth every penny. I have come across many others with the stroller and they all rave about it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stroller. Minimal and fast assembly. It is everything I was expecting after watching videos and reading reviews. Did not disappoint. It is a bit bulky and heavy when folded up but worth the sacrifice for the functionality of the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller however the sun shade does not work
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is absolutely wonderful however, after a week of use In noticed that the sun shade wouldnt stay down the entire time. It kind shrivels up...I am going to return this and repurchase maybe I got a faulty stroller?
customer_reviews.author: nishamc

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: I have not enjoyed this stroller at all. The tires will not stay inflated. It’s a pain to fold and shut (always banging the stroller on my knees and feeling like my hands are gong to get clamped). Stroller squeaks. Been a total nightmare. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: We love our bob and we get a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: We love our bob and we get a lot of compliments. We got the adapter for the graco infant seat and it works great! The stroller feels really sturdy and you can go up and down the sidewalk and on the grass. Cross country stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best jogger I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: The best jogger I have ever used...and this is my 4th one!! I love BOB jogger. I have had double and singles. Don't waste your time looking for any other brand if you want to use it for running. I know it's expensive, but it's well worth it for training with little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: The best stroller I ever had
customer_reviews.text: The best stroller I ever had. It is really easy to fold down and put back up. Perfect for bigger kids. It does not come with a snack tray, so if you need one, buy one separately.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: SO much better for walks on city sidewalks that have uneven pavement
customer_reviews.text: SO much better for walks on city sidewalks that have uneven pavement. I no longer scan ahead to avoid small bumps and uneven concrete. I wish I had started out with this!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: The best stroller we’ve had so far
customer_reviews.text: The best stroller we’ve had so far! Rides smooth, easy to assemble and break down and our toddler loves riding in it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stroller but hate that everything is sold separately- this does not come with the table attachment.
customer_reviews.author: David Whitlatch

customer_reviews.title: This is the best stroller, I recommend it to everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stroller, I recommend it to everyone. It’s so smooth when walking and my husband loves it for running. Make sure to lock the front wheel when running though ;)
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller in the world
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller in the world. I wish we didn't wait until our little one was 2.5 years old to buy this. It would have made a lot of days out much easier had we not opted to get a cheap (~$200) stroller from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yeah! Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the choice - it’s big and will last us a long time! Many walks toncome.
customer_reviews.author: Tala Bu

customer_reviews.title: Love the shade coverage
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth! Love the shade coverage... It's heavy, but we have other strollers for different uses.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B. Juntunen

product_meta.title: BOB Revolution Flex 2.0 Jogging Stroller - Up to 75 pounds - UPF 50+ Canopy - Adjustable Handlebar, Lunar
product_meta.description: Style:Stroller Only| Color:LunarThe Revolution Flex 2.0 is an ideal on and off road jogging stroller for outdoor enthusiasts and urbanites alike. Its swivel locking front wheel swivels for easy maneuverability or locks for stability when jogging on or off road; and it includes a tracking adjustment knob to keep your stroller running straight when in the locked position. The air filled tires and a mountain bike style suspension system provide an ultra smooth ride on any type of terrain from sidewalks to trails. The 9 position adjustable handlebar provides a perfect fit for any parent. Near flat seat recline accommodates sleeping children; while the fully upright seating position lets your child see the world on your adventures. Never rethread again; hassle free five point no rethread harness allows for easy adjustments and when you have finished your journey; the convenient two step fold is complete in seconds. Your child will have a cool; comfortable ride thanks to the ventilated seat and UPF 50+ canopy. Quick release design allows for effortless installation and removal of the wheels for on the go ease. The foot activated parking brake secures stroller in the stopped position; while the wrist strap provides safety while running. Keep all supplies; gear; toys and snacks in the integrated pockets and extra large cargo basket underneath the seat. This travel system ready jogging stroller can be combined with an infant car seat by BOB or Britax when using the BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter (B00LITRXMA sold separately). The Revolution Flex 2.0 Jogging Stroller can be used in position 1: 0 40 pounds and position 2: 41 75 pounds; 0 8 weeks with the use of an Infant Car Seat Adapter & compatible Infant Car Seat; child height 44” or less. Adjustable padded handlebar height 34.5 to 48 inches. Stroller dimensions 25.4”W x 43” H x 44” D. Folded dimensions 39“ L x 25.4“ W x 16“ H. Stroller weight 28.5 pounds. Rear tires 16” x 1.75”; front tire 12.5” x 1.75”.
feature_bullets: Fit: Birth to 75 pounds; 0 to 8 weeks with the use of an Infant Car Seat Adapter & compatible Infant Car Seat; child height 44 inch; Dimensions 25.4 W x 43 H x 44 D inches
Smooth; speedy stability: locking swivel front wheel; air filled tires; and mountain bike style suspension system
Adjustable & Safe: 9 position adjustable handlebar with wrist strap; no rethread five point harness; near flat recline; and extra large UPF 50 plus canopy
Carry more Gear: Store and organize your gear in the integrated pockets and extra large cargo basket
Travel system ready: Compatible with BOB or Britax Infant Car Seats when using the BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter (sold separately); and with most other major brands

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars547 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
